entry.title: Chinese Workers Say They Are Lured Abroad and Exploited for Belt-and-Road Jobs
entry.content: Five laborers tried to sneak into Malaysia to escape low-paying work in Indonesia, and tens of thousands of workers are similarly desperate, a labor-rights group says.

entry.title: China's Ambitious Climate Goals Collide With Reality, Hampering Global Efforts
entry.content: Beijing commits to net-zero emissions before 2060, but for years to come it will continue burning a lot of coal to keep its economy charging ahead.
